languagePacks.cityEHR:hint: Use language codes from IETF RFC 5646

controlItem.alertDisplay: There are alerts for this patient.
controlItem.errorDisplay: There may be alerts for this patient. Check did not run due to system configuration error.

adminTaskInstructions.line: Spreadsheet in ODF or MS Office Open format (.ods or .xlsx)
Or a spreadhseet saved as MS 2003 XML format.
XML file, or zip of XML file, containing a template record.
Files created by the patient export function can be loaded directly.
The file must contain a single iso-13606:EHR_Extract containing a set of cda:ClinicalDocument elements
Every cda:ClinicalDocument must be for the same patient as defined by the iso-13606:EHR_Extract

task.adminTaskLoadFile: Information model for upload (Ontology, Spreadsheet or Graph)

adminTaskInstructions.line: The model must conform to the cityEHR specification in one of the following formats.
Ontology - OWL/XML
Graph - graphML (created by Yed) or mm (Mindmap)
Spreadsheet - MS 2003 XML format
Directory can be for entries or elements
Entry directory format: iso-13606:EHR_Extract/iso-13606:entryCollection/iso-13606:entry/cda:component/cda:observation
Element directory format: iso-13606:EHR_Extract/iso-13606:elementCollection/iso-13606:element/iso-13606:data
The file must contain a set of user elements in the format required by cityEHR.
The file must contain a set of careTeam elements in the format required by cityEHR.
The file must contain an RDF knowledge map in the format required by cityEHR.
The file may be zipped or plain XML text.
Knowledge maps exported from cityEHR may be imported directly using this utility.
The file can be a spreadsheet (.ods or .xlsx), in the format required by cityEHR.
Or the file may contain a set of iso-13606:EHR_Extract elements containing cityEHR HL7 CDA documents.
The file may be zipped or plain XML text.
Records exported from cityEHR may be imported directly using this utility.
The patient list must be a spreadsheet (.ods or .xlsx).
Or an XML document containing <patient id=""> elements
